extendedInfo.description: Character Identikit allows to evaluate the fourteen universal personality characteristics by patterns of facial activity.Our approach based on the assumption of correlation between facial expressions formed by muscles (groups of muscles) of head and neck of the human and basic psychological features - some kind of universal consciousness and behavior archetypes.Use of questionnaires without the consent of the subject is impossible. However, the same, sometimes carefully hidden data can be recovered without personâs consent. This method will help you to understand motives of other people and to learn how to deal with them in a better way. Certainly, it can be used to cognize yourself!
